abstract: Bank of New York Mellon is accused of fraud in its role overseeing loan pools at the heart of an accord with Bank of America.
snippet: Bank of New York Mellon is accused of fraud in its role overseeing loan pools at the heart of an accord with Bank of America.
lead_paragraph: The New York attorney general is moving to block a proposed $8.5 billion settlement struck in June by Bank of New York Mellon and Bank of America over troubled loan pools issued by Countrywide. A lawsuit filed late Thursday accuses Bank of New York of fraud in its role as trustee overseeing the pools for investors.
